channel.title: Best method
channel.description:
What would you guys suggest would be the best way to finalize my Mithril Seeds?
Right now it is
1. Plant 2. Walk Back 3. Pick / Delete 4. If you pick you get flower of same color and the flower disappears 5. If you pick delete the flowers disappear
Now should I add a timer for the deletion of the flower when you click delete, or just keep it as it is?

item.title: Best method
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

i am infamy:

I suggest you add the timer, cause at the end its going to get all clogged up and lagg the shit out of the server

Youâ€™re retarded.

From the sound of it would be stylistic whether or not you would want the timer.

Read full topic

  5. If you pick delete the flowers disappear
